response: * James Grimble Groves (1854–1914), British brewer and politician

Robert Marsland Groves was born on 3 January 1880 at Stretford in Lancashire, England, the son of James Grimble Groves, a brewer and Conservative MP.Items Flight International, 3 March 1921 Robert Groves was educated at Rossall School.

Cumming was born in Walton-on-Thames in 1917. She had an indulgent childhood courtesy of her grandfather, James Grimble Groves, a member of parliament and a brewery owner.Company biographies, Groves and Whitnall. Retrieved 11 April 2017. Cumming spent much of her childhood in South Africa, where her father had bought a farm.
